= 9 tips to plan & study for online classes and save your grades =
	~ Mariana's Study Corner (YT)
	
1. Treating an online course like a real course
2. Make the best use of the software available
3. Use split screen
4. Prepare and devote extra time
5. Change your summarizing techniques
6. Have a strict schedule
7. log in early
8. get engaged
9. treat studying like a full time job
